Argento's hatred for the man leads her to find a way to get back at him.

The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with spikes with feeding tubes going all over the place and several skeletons and bodies, including two of the members of the original crew of the vehicle who found this place. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is the first of three in the series.
A group has just targeted an army base, and have stolen one and a half truckloads of military weapons, and kidnapped three soldiers including Kathie Peck, the girlfriend of Sargent Joe Armstrong (Joe) (Dudikoff).
